arts.sum: Borussia Mönchengladbach were unable to produce a response to Chema Andres' 79th-minute goal last weekend as Die Fohlen were condemned to a 1-0 away defeat at the MHPArena. The hosts are winless in th...

arts.ttl: Borussia Mönchengladbach vs Werder Bremen preview: Heaven only knows
arts.sum: Two of the Bundesliga’s most unpredictable sides face off on Sunday afternoon, so who knows what to expect.
